name: Apocrypha #4 - Ephemeral
description:
What is the essence of the reality in wich we exist? Are we a speck of dust, meaningless compared to the infinite and eternal, or it the present, being here and now, the most important thing there is? The infinite cycle of life and death, of chaos and order. Moment by moment things change, while everything is still the same. 
--
Every frame of being containing the entirety of existence. When and where one is all and all is one.
////////
3D Animation mainly done in Blender. Clouds done in Houdini
